about_the_game:
Your journey begins now, after the Big Departure, Kuara Bay has become one of the few habitable places on earth, but there is still hope to start over.
The future is in your hands, with some tools to start and wonderful people by your side, you have everything you need to begin this new adventure in a forgotten corner of Brazil.

Build a sustainable farm, explore caves, establish relationships and help restore the environment!
Become an environmentalist, whose mission is to restore the environment of the Kuara Bay region, control oxygen with reforestation, clean rivers, and lakes to make them habitable for marine life again, and save endangered animals to bring balance and life back, and don't forget to recycle!



Located on a small island in the middle of the gigantic Amazon River, Baia de Kuara, despite being a small town, is full of culture. Discover typical Brazilian foods, participate in events such as Carnival and the Ramalhos Dance in June. The city was built to symbolize a future of union and preservation, not only of the environment but also of culture and history.

Dance a forró during a quadrilha while drinking a good glass of quentão, jump to the sound of Axé, learn traditional Brazilian food recipes like acarajé and coxinha from your local tv host Namaria, meet the lovely villagers, and maybe find someone that can make your heart warm.



After the Big Departure many mining and resource extraction bots have been left active in the regions around the island and it's up to us to deactivate them to prevent the situation from getting worse, will you be able to?
Many dungeons await you!



  • Create a sustainable farm the way you want it.
  • Be the impact you want to be. Take good care of the environment to make the people of Kuara Bay happy and healthy
  • Interact with more than 30 unique inhabitants of Kuara Bay.
  • Participate in Brazilian festivals, such as Festa Junina and Carnaval.
  • Recycle! One's trash is another's treasure. Use resources extracted from recycled materials to advance, create and progress.
  • Rescue animals in danger and return them to the wild to bring balance back to the environment.
  • Love is love! Bind your heart with the island's inhabitants.



There’s a rumor of an ancient mystery deep in the Kuara Bay forest, can you and your friends
find out what it is and the stories that it will unveil?



Thanks for all the support!
